definition: unit (forming an entity)/element/(in a residential building) entrance or staircase
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon

sentences.english: The description of a nominal taxon when it is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立一个命名分类单元时所做的描述。

sentences.english: But developers have little incentive to build less-profitable units for low-income households.
sentences.chinese: 但开发商不愿为低收入家庭建造低利润的单元房。

sentences.english: Two special units focusing on initial and final consonant clusters.
sentences.chinese: 包含两个特别的单元，提供字首与字尾子音群的练习。

sentences.english: Individual families should be responsible for the cleanliness of their own units.
sentences.chinese: 每个家庭都有义务清洁他们自己的居住单元。

sentences.english: Follow these steps to map subunits to existing models and packages.
sentences.chinese: 按照以下的步骤来将子单元映射为已存在的模型和包。

sentences.english: The bending stress is zero for the element at B.
sentences.chinese: 在B处的单元体，弯曲应力为零。

sentences.english: You decide to use a microflow process to scope the unit of work.
sentences.chinese: 您决定使用微流程来界定该工作单元的范围。

sentences.english: By optimizing the object function, the feeding currents of column are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 通过优化目标函数，得到所需的单元馈电电流。

sentences.english: This new stiffened plate element has the same degree of freedom as regular plate elements.
sentences.chinese: 任意加筋板单元具有和常规板单元相同的自由度。

sentences.chinese: 任意加筋板单元具有和常规板单元相同的自由度。

sentences.english: This room, for example, into zillions of tiny little elements.
sentences.chinese: 比方说我们可以把这间屋子，分成大量的小单元。

sentences.english: At the same time, This disquisition introduces the software design of upper computer.
sentences.chinese: 本文从硬件和软件两个方面论述了这三个单元的设计。

sentences.english: The solution of Finite Element Method and Rigid Bar Method calculating foundation pressure is adopted on the pier pilebox foundation.
sentences.chinese: 用有限单元链杆解法，计算墩桩箱形基础地基反力。
